resources.string: Dormitory(Fees Rs.18000 per year) 2 student in room with small window
Semi-Delux(Fees Rs.22000 per year) 1 student in room with small window
Delux(Fees Rs.26000 per year) 1 student in room with Large window

Krishna Avenue Hostel.. is a boys hostel.. which is loacated at walking distance from K.K wagh college of engineering,And near to MET BKC IOE,Nashik 
 Our Hostel provides you: 
1. Free WIFI service 
2. Free Laundry service 
3. RO water filter 
4. TV for entertainment 
5. Solar water heater 
6. No need to pay electricity bill included in Fees.
